sub_title: Let's break the status quo! | Last Year B.B.A. in International Business Student | Startup and Innovation enthusiast | Cars Lover | Spread knowledge and help
summary:
"Work for what you want, pray for what you need, and fight for what you've always dreamt about".

‚úãüèΩHi! my name is Amadeus and welcome to my LinkedIn profile!

üéìI have a high school degree in Healthcare Biotechnology‚öïÔ∏è, I'll be graduating with a Business Administration Bachelor in International Business with a specialization in Marketing & Sales (2024) and I¬¥ve been doing an exchange semester at the ESB Business School in Germany with a focus in Project Management and Enteprenershipüìä

üåÅ I'm an Italian üáÆüáπ student currently studying in The Netherlands üá≥üá± with a strong passion for travelling, cars, startups and new technologies.

üí• Top skills: Quick adaptability, Leadership, independence and precision. I'm also a PowerPoint Excel (+PowerBi) lover‚ô•Ô∏è 

üÜì Top free time activities: Read books, Go to the gym and Network with awesome peopleü§ù

In the past, I¬¥ve been a business development associate for a British venture capital expanding the business in Singapore, Israel, Germany and Italy. 

üöóI recently worked as an intern for Mercedes-Benz in Region Europe as a market management intern in aftersales. my main activities were: 
- reporting roll-out projects
- build presentations for the various markets
- supporting the market managers with the different market requests
